translation.how_to_transfer:
输入以下命令进行转账：

/transfer [货币符号] [金额] [地址]
例如，/transfer BTC 0.3 xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx
translation.how_to_create_red_envelope:
输入以下命令以创建红包：

/create [金额] [数量]
例如，/create 500 7
translation.reapp_error_1101: The token is not in the whitelist
translation.reapp_error_1102: The expiration time is too short
translation.reapp_error_1103: The token allowance is not enough
translation.reapp_error_1108: The red enveloper is not valid
translation.reapp_error_1113: The red enveloper has not expired
